author: Source: Dudleynews.co.uk
title: Philippe Coutinho hands new Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp early boost... - Dudleynews.co.uk
text:
Jurgen Klopp held his first training session as Liverpool manager with a reduced squad but there was some early good news for the German. International duty meant just nine first-team players, supplemented by three youth team goalkeepers, were present at Melwood as the former Borussia Dortmund boss began work proper on Monday afternoon after his appointment on Thursday.
 Dudleynews.co.uk.
